titleStmt.title: The necessity of keeping our parish-churches argued from the sin and danger of the schisms in the Church of Corinth and of the present separations : in a sermon before the honourable judges, at the last assizes, held at Exeter / by Francis Fullwood.
titleStmt.author: Fullwood, Francis, d. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.T. and R.H. for James Collins ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
